data.meanings: fig, fig tree; name of a hillock. The fig is a symbol of the. era of Adam, of Mosaic day and that of Jesus.
data.sentence: The word وَالتِّينِ comes from the root ت ي ن and is associated with the meanings: fig, fig tree; name of a hillock. The fig is a symbol of the. era of Adam, of Mosaic day and that of Jesus.
The word وَالزَّيْتُونِ comes from the root ز ي ت and is associated with the meanings: oil, olive-oil, olive-tree.
